title: Chapter Five: ‘Democrat, Republican, White, Black, Green’
description: The Improvement Association PAC’s power in the county is threatened when an unlikely candidate enters the race for county commissioner. Plenty of people outside the PAC now have their own ideas about how to build Black political power here. Zoe examines what this election could mean for the PAC’s future.
author: improvementassociation@nytimes.com (Serial Productions & The New York Times)
